```{r}
library(bio3d)
seq=read.fasta("A16368238_mutant_seq.fa")
seq
```
```{r}
conserv(seq)
```
Find specific mutations.
```{r}
s=which(conserv(seq)<1)
s
```

```{r}
seq$ali[,s]
```







Find if the mutations are clustered in a specific domain. PFAM id of domain
```{r}
hmmer("A16368238_mutant_seq.fa", id="PF00069")
```
